Title: Pilot
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical, Sci-Fi
Actors: Zach Callison, Estelle, Michaela Dietz, Deedee Magno
Plot: Steven gets a hold of a magical time travel hourglass and does what any kid would do - he uses it for comebacks. But toying with magic draws trouble to his sleepy beach town and Steven has to step up and save the day - with more comebacks.
